ygData.subject: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Astral nodded. Come on, were going to see Zardus, Astral said back to the others. They flew up in the air, and flew to where Zarus was, and hovered there

::Dark Lavacons::

        Astral nodded.

       "Come on, were going to see Zardus," Astral said back to the others.

       They flew up in the air, and flew to where Zarus was, and hovered
there for a second.

       Astral spoke to the others.

       "Fenox, you and the others go into the Iron Fist, and settle down, I
am going to see Zardus," He ordered.

      Fenox nodded, and then he went towards the Iron Fist, the others
following.  They landed and went inside, and looked around.  Their first
time in a base, at least as a Dark Lavacon.

      Astral flew down to where Zardus was.

      "Greetings, Zardus.  Is there anything me and my troops may do for
you?" Astral said, loyally.
